title: Usain Bolt, Shakira Donated Millions to Haiti After Hurricane Matthew
subtitle: Fake news articles inaccurately credited Jamaican sprinter Usain Bolt and Colombian singer Shakira with millions of dollars in donations to the hurricane-ravaged nation of Haiti.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Usain Bolt donated $10 million and Shakira donated $15 million to help rebuild Haiti after Hurricane Matthew.
